title: can't play LoL on dvi
body:
when i want to play LoL on DVI i get a blackscreen when champion select is done i still have sound but my monitor is off like not even blacklight is on and after a while it says that it doesn't have a connection but when i play on HDMI it work perfect 

i tried deleting the game.cfg file but that didn't work are there other solutions pls help ;)

replies.body: nice the problem is solved ty

Hey there,

Could you try launching the game in windowed mode? Let me know if this works and we can go from there.

Apologies for the delayed response.
